resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105636</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105636</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206796</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">On the Homefront</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auf dem Homefront</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sur le Homefront</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">No Homefront</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sul Homefront</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στο Homefront</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En el Homefront</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">features posters and images illustrating some of the ways American's at home contributed to war efforts overseas during World Social Sciences I and II. The images are presented in 5 categories: volunteer work, civil defense, conservation, economic initiatives, and patriotic support.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Merkmale Plakate und Bilder, die zu Hause etwas 
von dem Methoden Amerikaner übersee beigetragen zu den 
Kriegbemühungen während der Weltsozialwissenschaften I und II 
veranschaulichen. Die Bilder werden in 5 Kategorien dargestellt:
freiwillige Arbeit, Zivilverteidigung, Erhaltung, ökonomische 
Initiativen und patriotischer Support.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">affiches et images de dispositifs illustrant une 
partie de l'Américain de voies à la maison contribué aux efforts de
guerre outre-mer pendant les sciences sociales du monde I et II. 
Les images sont présentées dans 5 catégories : travail 
volontaire, défense civile, économie, initiatives économiques, et 
support patriotique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">posteres e imagens das características que 
ilustram algum do americano das maneiras na HOME contribuída aos 
esforços da guerra no ultramar durante ciências sociais do mundo I e
II. As imagens são apresentadas em 5 categorias: trabalho
voluntário, defesa civil, conservation, iniciativas econômicas, e 
sustentação patriotic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">manifesti ed immagini delle caratteristiche che 
illustrano alcuno dell'americano di modi nel paese contribuito agli 
sforzi di guerra oltremare durante le scienze sociali del mondo I ed 
II. Le immagini sono presentate in 5 categorie: lavoro 
volontario, difesa civile, conservazione, iniziative economiche e 
supporto patriotic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαρακτηρίζει τις αφίσες και τις εικόνες που επεξηγούν 
μερικών από τους τρόπους Αμερικανού που συμβάλλουν στο σπίτι 
στις πολεμικές προσπάθειες στο εξωτερικό κατά τη διάρκεια των 
παγκόσμιων κοινωνικών επιστημών Ι και ΙΙ. Οι εικόνες 
παρουσιάζονται σε 5 κατηγορίες: εθελοντική εργασία, αστική 
υπεράσπιση, συντήρηση, οικονομικές πρωτοβουλίες, και πατριωτική 
υποστήριξη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">carteles e imágenes de las características que 
ilustran a algo del americano de las maneras en el país contribuido a
los esfuerzos de la guerra en ultramar durante ciencias sociales del 
mundo I e II. Las imágenes se presentan en 5 categorías: 
trabajo voluntario, defensa civil, conservación, iniciativas 
económicas, y ayuda patriótica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206796</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105636</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/on-the-homefront</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
